issue.title: [GLib] Install header files and documents to wrong directories
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Header files should be installed into
${PREFIX}/include/arrow-glib/ instead of
${PREFIX}/include/apache-arrow-glib/

Documents should be installed into
${PREFIX}/share/doc/arrow-glib/ instead of
${PREFIX}/share/doc/apache-arrow-glib/.
